Name: Gardenia: Prologue
About the game: Gardenia: Prologue is a free, standalone version of Gardenia. The story takes place on a different island, but you will notice some connections to the main plot of Gardenia. Youâ€™ll have a chance to try your gardening and crafting skills, rearrange the vegetation of the island, build roads and fences. Remember to take photos of your beautiful garden compositions! The storyline is focused on the character of a both gentelman and a genius inventor Mr. C. Sum, who is researching some artifacts on the island and has certain tasks for the player. Key Features: An atmosphere of relaxation on a distant paradise island Arrange the space the way you want to create beautiful plant compositions A beautiful story to experience and a mystery to unravel A unique crafting system based on the Magic Crafting Table Dexterity elements (magic mushrooms and their properties)
